snippet.title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Amalur is expanding its borders and heading into the unknown territory of... Nintendo. 

Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning is coming to Nintendo Switch on March 16th, 2021! Just in time before the adventure continues in the brand-new expansion, Fatesworn, coming later this year.

Return to the Faelands and forge your fate into the shape of your choosing. Uncover the secrets of Amalur and rescue a world torn apart by a vicious war - finally on-the-go!
---
Website: https://amalur.thqnordic.com/
Discord: http://discord.gg/amalur

#KingdomsOfAmalur #ReReckoning
